short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For kids who are lack of self-discipline but need to study online, this extension stops web pages with hostname containing 'game'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for young kids who are lack of self-discipline but need to study online, this extension stops them spending time on web pages with hostname containing 'game', e.g., addictinggames.com. 

Web pages from a matched game site will be replaced with links to learning websites. Warning: it is only for very young kids as big kids may disable this extension by themselves.

21.05.01.1: add chess related sites to whitelist
21.04.01.1: Add sites to white list
21.02.12.1: Fixed a bug related to testing whether a website is in the whitelist
